The tree raised its whisk and said, "Do you still see it?
He said, "Where is there an eyeless Buddha?
The tree said, "Gee, it's hard to come back.
The saṃgha circled the meditation couch once and got out.
The tree said, "It's only right that he's good at it.
The monk then shouted.
The tree said, "The old monk doesn't know his son.
He said, "What's the point of knowing?
The tree struck the meditation bed three times.
Zhaojue Qingyun said.
"The jujube tree has a mouth like a dumbbell.
That monk has eyes like blindness.
He circled the meditation bed once.
He was a defeated general.
He knocks on the meditation bed three times.
The bow was broken, and the arrows were exhausted.
Baiyan Fu said.
"The jujube tree has exhausted its tricks.
After all, he couldn't do anything to help that monk.
That monk showed his full range of ugly expressions.
After all, he couldn't escape the shroud of the jujube tree.
Neither of them is attainable.
If he were to come to that monk's place.
They must both eat the stick and take advantage of it to get out.

source_sentence: 宗門拈古彚集卷第三十九
translation: Zongmen xingu xueji vol. 39
